review: The part that you put in the cup holder is too small so it doesn't balance right. I have to put styrofoam in around it just for it to hold my lunch in place. When it was shipped to my house, it had a chip in the border part that keeps everything from sliding off but i kind of expected that. It's definitely a little less than i had expected but still a great purchase.
productTitle: Evelots Automobile Swivel Tray Car Truck Food Snacks Electronics Cup Holder
